events.name: Sunday Showcase
events.description: Saturday 4th April to Monday 6th April 2015 10am to 7pm ArtScience Museum, Level 4 FREE Random Blends 2015 Random Blends is a showcase of projects conceptualized and created by students from the Communications and New Media (CNM) department at the National University of Singapore. Following this year’s theme of ‘Inter(__)’ (pronounced ‘Interspace’), these student works invite YOU to interact with their projects and create your own unique interpretations. Featuring digital games, video productions, comics and lots more, there is something for everyone to explore.

events.name: Hackerschool Ruby on Rails workshop
events.description: Please sign up using the ticket link! *Familiarity with HTML and CSS is expected. Server side programming, such as PHP, is preferred but optional The workshop covers the basics of the Ruby language, but expects that you have got the fundamentals of programming languages so that we can cover more ground. In addition, we will cover how Rails builds web applications using the MVC (model view controller) paradigm, with hands-on exercises to venture deeper into each layer of a web application.
events.location: SR3, Town Plaza (Level 2), University Town, NUS

events.name: Engineers.SG Volunteers Training
events.description: We want to capture all the important moments in hacker history and can't do it alone. So, join us! Agenda: - Overview of video recording techniques available. - How to setup the recording equipment. - Intro to video editing with iMovie - Discussion on the upcoming meetup schedules. Register as a volunteer here: http://bit.ly/engineerssg-volunteers-form PS: We can meet earlier for lunch. PPS: Remember to check out the WeBuild.SG live recording that morning as well.
